title: Justin Bieber's 'ex' Sahara Ray goes TOPLESS in an edgy photoshoot for Siberia Hills
text:
She shot to fame when she went skinny dipping with Justin Bieber back in 2016.

And on Thursday, model Sahara Ray turned heads once again as she posed topless in an edgy photoshoot for streetwear brand Siberia Hills.

Taking to Instagram, the 26-year-old Australian model posted a series of pictures in which she was wearing just a velcro strap to cover her ample assets.

Turning heads! Justin Bieber's 'ex' Sahara Ray (pictured) goes TOPLESS in an edgy photoshoot for Siberia Hills

'Sex symbol,' she captioned the post, followed by peach emojis, which are used to represent buttocks.

The model cut a very edgy look in paint-splattered baggy white pants and black combat boots on a warehouse photoshoot.

In one snap, she stretched to show her incredibly slim figure while her face was covered with a spray-painted love heart.

Cheeky 'Sex symbol,' she captioned the post, followed by peach emojis, which are used to represent buttocks

Risque: Taking to Instagram, the 26-year-old Australian model posted a series of pictures in which she was only wearing a velcro strap to cover her ample assets

In another, she appeared to be completely topless but had covered her chest with her hands as she stared into the camera in ripped jeans.

Sahara was famously caught by the paparazzi enjoying a skinny dipping session with Justin Bieber three years ago in August 2016.

However, since then Justin has moved on to model Hailey Baldwin, who he married last Monday in front of 150 guests.

Throwback! Sahara was famously caught by the paparazzi enjoying a skinny dipping session with Justin Bieber (pictured) three years ago in August 2016

This hasn't stopped Sahara from cashing in on her notoriety, as she now has over 1.2 million Instagram followers and a self-titled swimwear range worn by celebrities such as Kim Kardashian.

As well as catching Justin's eye, she has been romantically linked to singer Cody Simpson and model Jordan Barrett in the past.

Sahara is the daughter of former big wave surfer Tony Ray, and grew up around the beaches of California and Hawaii.
description: She shot to fame when she went skinny dipping with Justin Bieber in 2016.
authors: Shive Prema For Daily Mail Australia
